other_tests.changes_over_time: Subsequent blood cultures were negative after treatment.

other_tests.findings: A gram-negative rod was isolated from the culture.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The same gram-negative rod was identified from cultures obtained peripherally and through the catheter.

other_tests.findings: Demonstrated that the gram-negative rod had distinctive nonstaining vacuoles.
Organism was identified as M. mesophilicum, susceptible to gentamicin and ciprofloxacin but resistant to ceftazidime and mezlocillin.
